name: Sohoo Poker - Top Texas Holdem
description:
Sohoo Poker is the world's best and the most interesting poker game, including Texas Hold ' Em and Omaha, but also rich Texas games, you can enjoy the joy of the game with millions of players from all over the world, More abundant variant rules of Texas Hold'em will also be added to the game, come and download our APP, and start the game now!

Game Features:
Free Chips - By downloading the game you will receive lots of chips for free! In addition, by logging in daily, completing exclusive daily missions, upgrading and inviting friends can also get plenty of chips!

Sohoo Points - Important growth system in Sohoo Poker. You can receive Sohoo Points by upgrading and completing missions, then redeem them for various in-game goods, such as chips, collections and tournament tickets. Abundant items are waiting for you!

Real Gaming Experience - We have carefully studied the rules and details of Texas Hold'em in order to as much as possible provide players with the realest and the best Texas Hold'em poker, and to ensure that players can not only enjoy the thrill of Texas Hold’em, but also have fun in the world of Sohoo Poker.

Gorgeous art style and scene special-effects - The art style of Sohoo Poker is in line with the public aesthetic standard, at the same time provides players with an immersive feeling of playing Texas Hold'em at the real poker table.

Fair Play - To make Sohoo Poker a wonderful Texas Hold'em game, we believe that creating a fair game environment is the most important target. So after optimizing our algorithm over and over again, we finally got the international RNG certification!
